remarks: Define the "compact generator", the functor from topological spaces to compactly generated spaces.  Also known as the k-ification operation.  A set is k-open, i.e. ` x e. ( kGen `` j ) ` , iff the preimage of ` x ` is open in all compact Hausdorff spaces.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)

df-kgen $p |- kGen = ( j e. Top |-> { x e. ~P U. j | A. k e. ~P U. j ( ( j |`t k ) e. Comp -> ( x i^i k ) e. ( j |`t k ) ) } ) $.
